definition: ashamed/embarrassed/not having the face (to meet people)/not daring (out of shame)
lit. without head, without face (idiom)/fig. frenzily/haphazardly

sentences.english: It's a shame and I am ashamed for my own country!
sentences.chinese: 真是無恥呀，我這會兒還爲我的國家感到沒臉見人。

sentences.english: He replied, “Mr Li, my study performance is still so poor and I feel shameful before you.
sentences.chinese: 李老師，我學習還那麼差，沒臉見你。

sentences.english: He is always shameless, and is repulsive to others.
sentences.chinese: 他總是這樣沒皮沒臉的，招人討厭。

sentences.english: But if you don't get my pictures back, I'm gonna be humiliated .
sentences.chinese: 但如果你不去把我的照片拿回來，我會沒臉見人。
